long_description: The waterproof Marmot Mantra shell pants are built to charge down big lines or launch massive tricks in the park. Every pocket, closure and piece of fabric is designed to maximize your comfort. MemBrain(R) two-layer waterproof, breathable laminated fabric fends off moisture and wind while reducing internal condensation, so you stay dry, warm and comfortable. All seams are taped to prevent moisture from seeping in. Cordura(R) nylon scuff guards at the hems resist cuts from sharp ski edges. Articulated knees allow comfortable range of motion with no tugging. Ankle zippers let you pull the pants on and off over footwear. Internal gaiters with gripper elastic fit snug around your boot tops to keep snow out. Open up the inseam leg vents for cooling airflow. Marmot Mantra shell pants have zippered hand pockets, zippered back pockets and a zippered cargo pocket. Loose fit.
